title: Subordinate a Mortgage Lien
description: A customer is refinancing their first mortgage with another lender and needs the bank to subordinate its second mortgage (HELOC) to the new first mortgage.

tasks.description: Receive the subordination request from the other lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the request and all supporting documents.

tasks.description: Review the request to ensure it meets the bank's policy for subordination (e.g., loan-to-value ratio is acceptable).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the new loan terms and confirms they meet policy guidelines.

tasks.description: Approve the request and generate the subordination agreement to be sent to the other lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the request and sends the legal agreement to the title company.
